contents: Article 2 (Purpose) Member city/provincial sports associations conduct various activities to promote sports in the local community, contributing to improving the health and physical strength of city/provincial residents, improving leisure use and welfare, and protecting the human rights and interests of athletes, and nurturing excellent athletes. The purpose is to be able to represent cities, provinces, and the Republic of Korea. Revised 2021. 2. 4., 2021. 10. 6.
